title: Data Driven Scrum
summary: A practical guide to making Scrum work as intended by using structured internal reporting and actionable insights. Learn how to combine Delivery KPIs, Team Health KPIs, and Narrative Data to boost transparency, spot patterns, and drive meaningful improvements — with AI as your ally in keeping teams healthy, productive, and engaged.

title: On High-Performing Teams & People
summary: An exploration of how principles from open-source communities, as described by Pieter Hintjens in Social Architecture, can transform corporate teams into high-performing, resilient groups. Through eight core principles — transparency, fair process, scalable patterns, low barriers to entry, toxicity management, the right to learn, sustainability, and shared ownership — the article blends personal experience with proven practices to show how leaders can design systems that inspire intrinsic motivation, trust, and enduring performance.
